overview.en: Idle (IDLE) is a cryptocurrency launched in 2020and operates on the Ethereum platform. Idle has a current supply of 13,000,000 with 1,248,676.30647828 in circulation. The last known price of Idle is 10.57515782 USD and is down -7.22 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 1 active market(s) with $391,200.23 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://idle.finance/.
